reviewText: I love this story of a little Aussie girl who travels the world with Santa to find her lost Joey. A bit cheesy live-action/animation, but it was done in the 80's.
I Love it Thank you so Much, I've been looking for this forever
I grew up off of the Dot films when I was a kid, and now that I am slowly finding them on DVD, my children love these films. They teach about friendship, kindness, and good values.

My 3yr old loved Dot and the Whale although she did not get the message of saving the planet but she could tell me everything that happened.  This movie was very informative but she could not sit still; therefore, I don't think this movie grabbed her attention like before.  Will save it for next year to see what 4yr old brings us.
